category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Removes toxic Heat, resolves Phlegm, disperses nodulation, removes Stagnation and reduces swelling

indications: Carbuncles, furuncles, scrofula, sore, boils, tumors, snake bites, insect bites
Cough, acute tonsillitis, sore throat, venereal disease

contraindications: Contraindicated for those who are weak.

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is said that this herb is able to eliminate pathogenic factors, lessen all kinds of poisoning, remove a dead fetus and cure pernicious malaria.
This herb is very potent and cures poison with poison.
It is said that if you really understand this herb, you are not afraid of sleeping with poisonous snakes.
